headline: DoorDash Refines Global Footprint And Enters Reservations With SevenRooms Deal
summary: DoorDash (NasdaqGS:DASH) is exiting four international markets, withdrawing Deliveroo and Wolt services from Qatar, Singapore, Japan, and Uzbekistan. The company is expanding into restaurant reservations through the acquisition of SevenRooms. These moves indicate a tighter focus on markets with higher long term potential and a broader push into restaurant services beyond delivery. DoorDash built its core business around food and convenience delivery, and more recently has been extending...

headline: What DoorDash (DASH)'s Exit From Four Markets Means For Shareholders
summary: In late February 2026, DoorDash said it would exit Qatar, Singapore, Japan, and Uzbekistan under its Deliveroo and Wolt brands after a multi‑month country review, beginning an orderly wind‑down while keeping its previously issued financial guidance unchanged. This retrenchment marks a clear pivot toward concentrating investment in markets where DoorDash believes it has the best chance of achieving sustainable scale and long‑term leadership, even as it continues integrating acquisitions like...
